author: sarowe
msg: SOLR-4839: Set Jetty 9's new option to persist its temp directory (persistTempDirectory) - where the war is exploded - to true, so that the server/solr-webapp/ directory doesn't get deleted when Jetty shuts down gracefully

author: kmcgrail
msg: Removed undef returns for perlcritic test

author: hanya
msg: #i63614# fix strange type missmatch when Iif runtime function is used
Second or later compilation uses value type returned by previous execution of code.
Use the defined type as return value of the runtime function of Basic always.

author: reschke
msg: OAK-2379 - switch DOCUMENT_RDB back to file persistence (rather than in-memory)
